item.title: SVM and vectors for the curious
item.description: I posted a pair of articles/notes on SVM and vectors. I was curious how they worked and I’m sure these notes will be useful to me or others. Especially for some basic mathematics related to machine learning. Notes on Vectors Notes on SVM
